alert.note: Alert for Bay; Calhoun; Holmes; Jackson; Liberty; Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 04 at 8:19AM EST until January 04 at 9:15AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northeastern Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northern Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southeastern Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... Eastern Holmes County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northwestern Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 915 AM EST/815 AM CST/. * At 819 AM EST/719 AM CST/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Chipley, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Vernon, Chipley, Graceville, Bonifay, Blountstown, Marianna, Chattahoochee, Bradford, Malone, Sneads, Cottondale, Grand Ridge, Greenwood, Altha, Alford, Wausau, Esto, Ebro, Campbellton and Noma. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon EST/1100 AM CST/ for Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida...and southwestern Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon EST/1100 AM CST/ for Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida...and southwestern Georgia.
